description:
WELCOME TO YELLOW GUM COTTAGE...
Dating back to the 1930's this gorgeous cottage still boasts many original features and has recently been tastefully updated with all of today's modern conveniences.
High ceilings are throughout the home as well as picture windows, which provide a glorious view of the garden.
Only a few years old, the country style kitchen comes with dishwasher and a stylish freestanding cooker and has access to the courtyard - which is within easy reach to the veggie patch and herb garden - just perfect for when you are cooking your favorite meals.
The master bedroom has an adjoining study area, which can be converted into a walk in robe, the remaining two bedrooms are of great size.
Outside offers a ½ acre wonderland of gardens, boardwalks and veggie patches, where the kids can play for hours on end while you are entertaining friends at the BBQ area.
There is plenty of under-house storage, plus a large garage at the top of the block, workshop, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
This home has so much to offer - come along to inspect today!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Make me an offer!
The owners have moved on and want to sell, so this is your chance to secure this private, yet fantastically located home, a stones' throw from shops, Cockatoo Primary School and public transport.
Set on 1680m2 (approx.) of land, this character home consists of 3 bedrooms or (2 bedrooms with second living area/study), 1 bathroom and open plan kitchen and living area.
This would make a great first home or investment.
Other features include new carpets, shed/workshop out the back, gas ducted heating
plus wood heater, ceiling fans, instant gas hot water service and an established, yet relatively clear garden.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

YOUR COUNTRY ESCAPE ON 1.45 ACRES...
Set on 1.45 acresapprox this family size brick home offers plenty of room to move with 3 living areas & 4 bedrooms! Nestled in a quiet leafy location with sealed road access & walking distance to the shops, school & transport this large home provides a haven to relax & enjoy space, privacy & the serenity that surrounds. The home offers gas ducted heating, gas wood fire, mains & solar power, shady verandahs plus low maintenance gardens which surround the home, circular drive & a large steel garage to keep the hobby lover happy! If you have been searching for a place for the kids to roam around, a space for the chooks, pony or dogs, this is the perfect country escape, inspect today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

EXECUTORS AUCTION! - Quaint cottage on great flat block.
Your opportunity to secure this fantastic block of approx. 3500m2 with renovators delight 2 bed home.
In the one family for more than 55 years, you can decide whether to renovate or detonate.
The gently sloping block has a beautiful aspect with mature gardens and two street entrances.
The cottage consists of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and central living area.
Situated in a quiet part of town, outside is a 2 car carport.
Get yourself ready because this property WILL BE SOLD!
Sieze the opportunity today !!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522
Terms: 10% deposit settlement 30/60/90/120.
Photo ID Required
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

MAKE YOUR MARK HERE!
This is the perfect opportunity for you to secure a nice private location add your own touches to this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home & reap the rewards for the future! The central lounge/meals area offers a great view of the flat 1/4 acre allotment (approx), plus there is a separate studio & workshop perfect for you to pursue your interests in your own space! Call us & inspect today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

"ENCHANTING INSIDE & OUT"
Oozing charm, this superbly maintained Western Red Cedar residence sits on a huge corner allotment (approx. 1,668m2) with sealed dual driveways and a huge (9x7m) shed with concrete floor & power, ideal for a tradesperson, car or boat enthusiast.
Light and spacious, with high vaulted ceilings, the home comprises of three generous bedrooms including a master ensuite & walk in robe.
A sunken, light filled family lounge has a coonara wood-fire and there is gas ducted heating throughout, as well as ceiling fans and split system cooling.
A tiled hostess kitchen has stainless cooking and adjoining meals area.
Add a sensational paved outdoor entertainment area, water tank, decked verandah and a superb colour-filled garden.
This is the complete package and a fantastic opportunity with all the hard work done for you!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Light Bright And Spacious On Almost 1 Acre!!!
Set in the beautiful and private part of the lovely hills town of Cockatoo is this magnificent property that needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. Outside offers a stunning park like setting of almost 1 acre with large lawn areas and plenty of room for the kids to play. This character home offers 3 bedrooms, study nook, fresh modern tones, stylish quality kitchen with adjoining meals area and separate split level lounge with high ceilings and open fire place. Special features include split system heating and cooling unit, coonara, large windows to allow of plenty of natural light, polished timber floors, natural gas ducted heating, dishwasher and a huge decked entertaining area. Outside also offers a large hobby shed/outdoor entertaining room with a bar and covered entertaining area. Call today, your country lifestyle awaits!!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

PERFECTLY MAINTAINED & READY FOR YOU!
This goreous 3 bedroom brick veneer home is extremely well maintained & is nestled in a lovely quiet position on a no through road. Offering polished floorboards, light & bright living area, updated kitchen & bathroom, ducted heating, roller shutters & an outdoor covered entertaining area for those summer BBQ's! Set on a useable low maintenance 1/4 acre allotment with landscaped garden beds, plenty of parking plus there is a lock-up garage with workshop, concrete floor & power - inspect today, this could be just what you have been looking for!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

OUTSTANDING FAMILY LIFESTYLE ON ALMOST 2/3 OF AN ACRE
Sale by Set Date 8/11/2011
With an easy to live floor plan this neat 3 bedroom home offers the very best in family living with enough space for the family to spread out. Boasting two separate living zones, dining area and study, which are complimented by polished hardwood floors and a modern colour scheme throughout that creates a contemporary atmosphere. All 3 bedrooms are of a great size and come with built in robes, the master with ensuite and double shower. The renovated kitchen will impress those who love to entertain with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and striking black caesar stone bench-tops. There is almost 2/3 of an acre of usable land to enjoy, with the added bonuses of a fully fenced back yard, HUGE 4 car garage with concrete floor (power available but not connected) and under house storage. Special features include double carport, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a verandah that has beautiful views of distant fields. Homes presented this well don't last long, call today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

COUNTRY LIFESTYLE ON ALMOST ¾ OF AN ACRE
Enjoy a peaceful & private lifestyle from this well maintained cedar weatherboard home which is positioned on the high side of a no-through road. Nestled on almost of ¾ an acre in a leafy garden setting, the home offers cathedral ceilings, exposed beams, dado panelling& timber kitchen which features dishwasher & stainless steel appliances. There is gas ducted heating, crackling wood fire & air-conditioning to provide year round comfort. There is a small paddock for goats or sheep, garden shed for storage & wood shed plus the bedrooms all have BIR's plus 2 are double sized. Relax on the verandah& tune into the sounds of the local wildlife& enjoy the ambience this property has to offer, whatever you decide make the call to start your country lifestyle today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

ENJOY THE SPACE ON 1/2 AN ACRE !!!
High ceilings, polished floorboards and an open plan split level design make this home ooze a relaxed & welcoming atmosphere throughout. Inside the home offers a wood fire, split system heating & cooling & valley views which can be enjoyed from the front verandah. The kids will love the space outside plus the property backs onto a nature reserve so you can be sure you will enjoy plenty of wildlife & serenity! There is a big steel garage with mechanics pit, concrete floor & power plus other storage shedding, circular driveway & double carport - so what are you waiting for, call us & inspect today!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Neat Home PLUS 4 Car Garage!
Located in a quiet street this fantastic cedar weatherboard home is ideal for first home buyers or for those who want to expand their investment portfolio!
The 3 bedroom home features cathedral ceilings in the living area, BIR's to all bedrooms, large lounge room, meals area, Coonara and air-conditioner for year round comfort.
The usable 1/4 acre offers established trees, double carport, dual driveway, ample parking and a 4 car garage with concrete floor - perfect for storing all the toys!
Offering privacy away from neighbours, this home is a great is a great place to get started!
Call today!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Immaculate Home with room for all the toys on 2/3 acre
If space is what you are after, don't let this property pass you by!
All the hard work has been done so simply move in.
The home features multiple huge open living areas including lounge, family and rumpus room, also with 3 large robed bedrooms (master bedroom with ensuite and Walk in Robe) plus open study.
Entertaining and relaxed family living are at a premium for the active family including a solar heated pool surrounded by a large deck with outdoor kitchen, large lawn areas, fruit trees, fully fenced and divided backyard with chook pen and dog run going down to the creek at the rear of the property, all on nearly 2/3 of an acre (2409m2 approx).
For the boys, there is a large double garage plus workshop complete with concrete floor, power, plus double carport and extra parking on the fully sealed driveway.
Other features include gas ducted heating, 2 open fireplaces, modern kitchen with dishwasher, appliance cupboard and walk in pantry, 10000 Litre water tank, modern central bathroom with spa bath plus plenty of under house storage.
There are so many features - it is just a home you have to come and see -
& all this within close proximity to the shops, schools & public transport - don't let this opportunity for a fun family lifestyle pass by!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Build Your Dreams Here On Almost 1 Acre
Positioned in a private location, with sealed road access and close to Cockatoo's main town, is this terrific allotment of almost 1 acre which is the ideal place to build your dream home (STCA). With all services available, this block offers a lifestyle you can't resist. Call today this one won't last!!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

"Woorabinda" - Idyllic flat 3.1 acres (approx) with 3 bed home
Privately positioned at the end of a long tree lined driveway off a sealed road, this oasis provides you with all that you need.
The home consists of 3 robed bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (master with walk-in-robe and ensuite), two large separate living areas, timber kitchen complete with stainless steel dishwasher, oven and stove & extra large pantry.
Creature comforts are plenty with open fire place, coonara, gas heater and split system with the home also having been recarpeted and painted.
Mature and private gardens surround the home providing solitude plus there is also large open grassy areas for the kids to do as they please, kick the footy, play cricket, ride the bikes or maybe have a horse and the parents could still have room to perhaps follow some horticultural pursuits.
There is also a billabong and the property backs onto a creek at the rear.
Other features include triple carport (with roller doors), 2 lined sheds which have potential as a teenge retreat or an office, plus other various shedding.
The home is ready to just move in, this is the lifestyle choice you've been waiting for, so don't delay as this will go quick.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 to arrange an inspection now!!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Only For Those That Wish to Enjoy Life!
Modern, low maintenance, privacy....these are just some of the words that come to mind with this near new masterpiece of design and finish.
Surrounded by 1 acre (approx.) of natural gardens, the home boasts a versatile floor plan to cater for both entertaining and comfortable family living with 3 separate living areas, plus a large alfresco area which combines privacy and functionality giving a sense that you are surrounded by nature.
Spanning over approximately 40 squares under cover, the ambience created throughout the home is enhanced by the light and bright open spaces, sleek lines and soothing colour tones.
The master bedroom with HUGE walk in robe/dressing room, ensuite and study is zoned away from the living areas and other bedrooms.
Each bedroom boasts access to the verandah, where summer nights can be enjoyed in total solitude. The quality is evident throughout the home with the kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and Caeser stone benches, porcelain tiles throughout ,
plus there is gas ducted heating, European style laundry, separate downstairs rumpus/home theatre room with attached bathroom
and ample underhouse storage. Completing the picture is a large triple garage plus plenty of additional parking, garden lighting and to top it all off you can relax at the end of a hard day on your own private lawn which doubles as a pitch and putt!
Get away from it all but still have it all within easy reach of transport, shops and schools - call us and inspect today!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Light Bright And Spacious On Over ½ An Acre.
Sale by Set Date 20/9/2011
From the moment you enter this stunning property you will feel the instant relaxation that this magnificent hills lifestyle property has to offer. This home offers a sense of space with the home featuring quality kitchen with large adjoining dining room, comfortable separate lounge, 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, exposed beams, coonara, gas ducted heating and a fresh modern color scheme throughout. Outside offers a massive useable backyard with established trees, fantastic decked entertaining area that enjoys private views of the picturesque township of Cockatoo and is a great place to entertain your family and friends, under house storage, plenty of parking, double carport sealed drive and beautifully maintained established gardens. Make this hills lifestyle yours today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

The Perfect Family Home on ½ an Acre
Set on a stunning ½ acre allotment sits this magnificent home that features something for everyone in the family. With 4 large bedrooms, 2 of which overlook the fern gully at the rear of the property, cleared and fully fenced back yard and huge shed with power, concrete floor and coonara this property is sure to impress everyone. Also featured is a kitchen meals area with room for family dining and a spacious living area big enough for the whole family. Special features include claw foot bath, gas ducted heating, split system, circular driveway with separate shed access, chicken coup and decked area off the master bedroom. This property will not disappoint, inspect today!
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Stylish Living On 1/2 An Acre
Located in a quiet and highly sought after part of town sits this earthy hills home that features plenty of entertaining areas, both inside and out.
Situated on a useable and fully fenced 1/2 acre (approx.), this home features a large decked entertaining area with under cover Jacuzzi, hardwood polished floorboards, picture frame windows, large lounge area with separate study, 3 bedrooms and 2 split systems as well as a coonara for year round comfort. Outside features a double carport, large shed with power & concrete floor, double driveway, electric gates & established gardens.
Call today, inspection is a must!!!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Photo ID Required
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

A Must See For First Home Buyers & Investors!
This all round property would be ideally suited to first home buyers or even investors (with a tenant currently paying $300pw). Situated on a lovely 1/4acre (999m2 approx.) in a quiet part of town this warm family home consists of 3 bedrooms, central bathroom and open plan living alongside the kitchen & meals area. Other features include gas heating plus a wood heater and duel access to the low maintenance block.
Perfectly positioned close to shops and Cockatoo Primary be quick or miss out
Justin O'Hehir : 0404 405 225

Flexible Family Living On ½ An Acre!
Here is a perfect opportunity to purchase a home that offers so many living options for you and your family.
Nestled in a quiet pocket of Cockatoo, this
acre property has all bases covered with a 3 bedroom home PLUS 3 separate fully insulated cottages!
The split level home has built in robes to all bedrooms, updated family bathroom and semi-ensuite to the master.
The lower level consists of the master bedroom and family room which has gas heating and a Coonara to keep you warm on cold nights plus there is split system heating and cooling for the summer months.
The upper level contains the remaining two bedrooms, family bathroom, study alcove, meals area and kitchen which has a perfect view of the yard and covered entertaining area.
The fully fenced back yard has the three cottages (with carpet and power) only a short distance from the house, which would be ideal for use as a teenagers retreat/bedroom, work from home office, art studio's, guest accommodation or extra storage - the list is endless.
Whatever the need, this property has got it covered!
An inspection is a must - call today!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200
